title: League is turning into League of bruisers now
body: Bruisers such as Vi and J4, can survive the burst from assassins, delete squishy, they can duel tanks. There really is no weakness to a bruiser. they even bring cc which assassins don't. League of Tanks->League of Assassins->League of Bruisers?

replies.body: They're also very good at diving, which for the longest time has been pushing for dominance on the rift.
[Anyone else feel like they are back in season 3 all of a sudden?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aizCMO-mI1Q)
Those two probably need slight nerfs. I think the current situation will bring that around.

Nah. It's just the fact Vi and J4 have innate tankiness in the form of a bubble, a knock up, incredible mobility and dive potential, high base and scaling damage, and the main thing that puts them above most tanks/bruisers is the fact they also reduce your armor, which is what makes them duel tanks.
